633070.name: VectorWave Demo
633070.description:
This is the Demo to our upcoming game VectorWave!

VectorWave translates the traditional tower defense experience into virtual reality, allowing players the freedom to buy, place, toss, and move turrets as they see fit between each wave with almost no need for menus. Each hand serves its own purpose in your efforts to build an impenetrable defense grid against increasingly difficult hordes of malware bent on destroying your mainframe.

This demo is just a small slice of the finished game that will be releasing within a few weeks.
Many more features are included in the full version.

Demo Features


  • 5 Unique Levels
  • 6 Enemy Types
  • 7 Towers

All music tracks heard in this game were provided by Zachary Kemp.
